before_start:
{"blocks":[{"key":"dji9j","text":"Perform protein extraction from snap-frozen brain tissue:

- weigh tissue
- add RIPA buffer (see Materials) : 10 X of the weight (40 mg = 400 µL)
- homogenize samples using sample homogenizer
- sonicate samples at 4 degrees C, 3 times 15 seconds (keep the samples on ice between each sonication)
- centrifuge samples at 6000 g for 10 minutes at 4 degrees C
- collect supernatant and measure protein concentration
- aliquot protein extracts and store at -20 degrees ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"du7o7","text":"Protocol for the detection of proteins by Western blot from tissue extract ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44ahe","text":"Recipe for 100 mL 1x RIPA buffer :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hsfp","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ntie","text":"o   5 mL Tris pH 7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bs5l2","text":"o   1 mL Triton x100","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6a58","text":"o   1 g Deoxycholate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaej5","text":"o   3 mL 5M NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4e8l6","text":"o   200 µL 0.5M EDTA (pH 8.0)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ikss","text":"o   1 mL 10% SDS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n36a","text":"Add water until 100 mL (MilliQ water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cj4s","text":"Add protease and phosphatase inhibitors (Pi + PPi) right before use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgq55","text":"
